title: WBS Renumbering Inconsistent

title: Collapse/Expand Gantt Rows

notes: Working as designed.

notes: Hover logic fixed and stable.

title: Sample Dependencies Import

notes: CSV import tool validated.

description: Add inner bar to visualize % complete on Gantt bars.

title: Fix Missing Collapse/Expand Buttons

title: App Module Name wbs Unclear

title: Gantt filters not visible

notes: Restored data attributes + CSS highlight styling.

title: Gantt draggable scheduling
description: Allow dragging Gantt bars to reschedule tasks and update rollups.
notes: Drag with precision/confirmation shifts children rollup parents.

title: Gantt edit start/end dates
description: Provide precise editing of planned start/end dates directly on Gantt.

title: Gantt sticky headers columns

title: Gantt row height/spacing audit

title: Gantt dark mode toggle

title: Gantt arrow visualization upgrade

column13: Improves clarity and stability of dependency arrows.

title: Minimal WBS/deps fixtures
description: Provide minimal CSV fixtures (top-level tasks + FS deps) and import flag for fast arrow testing.

title: Gantt vertical scroll jitter

title: Gantt small-width overlap

title: Optimize WbsItem rollup functions

notes: Rolled up semantics now clear; batched saves in place; tests all pass.

title: Add TaskDependency constraints
description: Prevent self-dependency and enforce no circular dependencies; add model `clean()` and DB constraint or signals.
notes: Model.clean() validates; prevents self-deps and direct circular links.

title: Replace tags string with Tag model

notes: New Tag model + migration 0011 applied; works smoothly with admin.

title: Standardize duration calculation

notes: Added `inclusive` flag; defaults to True to match rollup +1 logic.
